content: कुंतलः {@--1@} The hair of the head, a lock of hair; प्रतनुविरलैः प्रांतोन्मीलन्मनोहरकुंतलैः <ls>U. 1. 20.</ls> <ls>Ch. P. 4</ls>, <ls n="Ch. P.">6</ls>; <ls>Gīt. 2.</ls> {@--2@} A drinking cup. {@--3@} A plough. {@--4@} Barley. {@--5@} A kind of perfume. --लाः (<ab>pl.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of a country and its inhabitants.
कुंतल <ab>N.</ab> of the country to the north of Cola. Kalyāṇa or Kallian Doorg south of Kurugade appears to have been its capital. The country represents the south-western portion of Hyderabad.
